name: Gas Distributors for Sustainability
goal:
The GD4S'objectives are:

- to promote the interests of its membership involved in the supply, trading and distribution of natural and renewable gas and related activities

- to raise the awareness on the potential of natural and renewable gas, its performances and its use in Europe

- to promote the use of natural gas in the context of the clean energy sector in Europe, in order to decarbonize the energy mix

- to promote the use of natural gas in the context of the clean mobility in Europe, such as biomethane
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Proposal for a regulation setting CO2 emission performance standards for new heavy-duty vehicles
- Proposal for a Regulation of the EP and of the Council setting emission performance standards for new passenger cars and for new light commercial vehicles as part of the Union's integrated approach to reduce CO2 emissions from light-duty vehicles and amending Regulation (EC) No 715/2007
- Proposal for a Directive of the EP and of the Council amending Directive 2009/33/EU on the promotion of clean and energy-efficient road transport vehicles
- Proposal for a Directive of EP and of the Council amending Directive 2012/27/EU on energy efficiency
- Proposal for a Directive of the EP and of the Council on the promotion of the use of energy from renewable sources
- EU long-term strategy for CO2 emissions reduction
